attributes.description: This dashboard shows Vulnerability  logs collected by the Sysdig integration.

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides an overview of the vulnerability logs collected by the Sysdig integration.

The dashboard highlights trends in the detection of critical vulnerabilities over time and displays counts of critical and high vulnerabilities. It also features bar charts that show vulnerabilities for which fixes are available and those that are exploitable, along with related metrics. Additionally, it includes a pie chart showing the most affected namespaces.

Select a suitable time range to avoid seeing partial results.

[**Integration Page**](/app/integrations/detail/sysdig/overview)

panelsJSON.title: All Critical and High Vulnerabilities by Type
Top Critical and High Vulnerabilities with Fix Available
